meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express disgust or contempt.
meanings.sent2: She said 'ptooey' when she saw the slimy bug.
meanings.sent3: Ptooey! I accidentally drank sour milk.
meanings.sent4: The spoiled food made me want to shout 'ptooey'!
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbage made me go 'ptooey' in disgust.

meanings.definition: To spit out forcefully in disgust.
meanings.sent1: He had to 'ptooey' out the bad-tasting medicine.
meanings.sent2: The taste was so awful that she 'ptooeyed' it out immediately.
meanings.sent3: I had to 'ptooey' the burnt popcorn I accidentally ate.
meanings.sent4: She 'ptooeyed' out the spoiled milk with a grimace.
meanings.sent5: The bitter coffee made him 'ptooey' it out onto the ground.
